headline.main: Putin Orders Sanctions Against Turkey After Downing of Jet
headline.print_headline: Putin Orders Sanctions Against Turkey After Downing of Jet

docs.snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Saturday called for sanctions against Turkey, following the downing this week by Turkey of a Russian warplane....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Saturday called for sanctions against Turkey, following the downing this week by Turkey of a Russian warplane.

headline.main: Detained Journalists Urge EU Not to Compromise With Turkey Over Human Rights
headline.print_headline: Detained Journalists Urge EU Not to Compromise With Turkey Over Human Rights

docs.snippet: Two Turkish journalists arrested this week over their reports about arms supplies to Syria urged the European Union not to compromise on human rights and freedoms as it seeks an agreement with Turkey to help stem flows of migrants to Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two Turkish journalists arrested this week over their reports about arms supplies to Syria urged the European Union not to compromise on human rights and freedoms as it seeks an agreement with Turkey to help stem flows of migrants to Europe.

headline.main: Mortar Attack on UN Base in North Mali Kills 3, Injures 20
headline.print_headline: Mortar Attack on UN Base in North Mali Kills 3, Injures 20

docs.snippet: Mortars lit up the dawn sky when they were fired on a United Nations base in the northern Mali city of Kidal early Saturday, killing at least three people....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mortars lit up the dawn sky when they were fired on a United Nations base in the northern Mali city of Kidal early Saturday, killing at least three people.

headline.main: Prominent Human Rights Activist Killed in Attack in Turkey
headline.print_headline: Prominent Human Rights Activist Killed in Attack in Turkey

docs.snippet: A prominent lawyer and human rights defender, who faced a criminal charge for supporting Kurdish rebels, was killed Saturday in an attack in southeast Turkey in which a police officer also died, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A prominent lawyer and human rights defender, who faced a criminal charge for supporting Kurdish rebels, was killed Saturday in an attack in southeast Turkey in which a police officer also died, officials said.

headline.main: Australia's Campbell Sets 100m Freestyle Short-Course Record
headline.print_headline: Australia's Campbell Sets 100m Freestyle Short-Course Record

docs.snippet: Cate Campbell set a world record for the 100 metres freestyle at the Australian short-course swimming championships on Saturday in a race where she eventually finished last....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cate Campbell set a world record for the 100 metres freestyle at the Australian short-course swimming championships on Saturday in a race where she eventually finished last.

headline.main: Lauda and Wolff Hold Hands Amid Talk of Strife
headline.print_headline: Lauda and Wolff Hold Hands Amid Talk of Strife

docs.snippet: Mercedes motorsport head Toto Wolff and the Formula One team's non-executive chairman Niki Lauda walked hand-in-hand in the Abu Dhabi paddock on Saturday in response to reports there was no love lost between them....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mercedes motorsport head Toto Wolff and the Formula One team's non-executive chairman Niki Lauda walked hand-in-hand in the Abu Dhabi paddock on Saturday in response to reports there was no love lost between them.

headline.main: Turkey's Erdogan Sees Paris Climate Summit as Chance to Mend Ties With Russia
headline.print_headline: Turkey's Erdogan Sees Paris Climate Summit as Chance to Mend Ties With Russia

docs.snippet: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Saturday the climate change summit in Paris next week could be a chance to repair relations with Moscow after Turkey shot down a Russian jet near the Syrian border on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Saturday the climate change summit in Paris next week could be a chance to repair relations with Moscow after Turkey shot down a Russian jet near the Syrian border on Tuesday.

headline.main: Experts Optimistic Tut's Tomb May Conceal Egypt's Lost Queen
headline.print_headline: Experts Optimistic Tut's Tomb May Conceal Egypt's Lost Queen

docs.snippet: Chances are high that the tomb of Ancient Egypt's boy-king Tutankhamun has passages to a hidden chamber, which may be the last resting place of the lost Queen Nefertiti, experts said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chances are high that the tomb of Ancient Egypt's boy-king Tutankhamun has passages to a hidden chamber, which may be the last resting place of the lost Queen Nefertiti, experts said on Saturday.

docs.snippet: The University of Colorado at Colorado Springs releases a photograph of the police officer killed during a siege at an abortion clinic. Rough cut ( no reporter narration)....
